MS MCQs

    Start your free Dynamics 365 Business Central trial

    »

    1. What is a work email address?

      A work email address is an email address that is provided by telecommunication providers and consumer email services.

      Work email addresses are email addresses from outlook.com, hotmail.com, and gmail.com.

      A work email address is an Office365 email address.

      A work email address is related to a professional domain and is not provided by telecommunication providers and consumer email services like outlook.com, hotmail.com, and gmail.com.


    2. How can you start with the demonstration company and what is included?

      The demonstration company includes configurations and data that allow you to explore and validate all functional domains that are covered by Business Central. You can immediately start and explore functions like sales quotes, orders, and invoices in Business Central. You can add, delete, and modify data and implement the available functions.

      You can immediately start with the demonstration company, which includes financial and logistical functionalities. Manufacturing and Service Management functionalities are only included with the advanced subscription type.

      The demonstration company includes configurations and data that allow you to explore and validate all functional domains that are covered by Business Central. You can immediately start and explore functions like sales quotes, orders, and invoices in Business Central. You can add data and implement the available functions, but you cannot delete and modify data.

      The demonstration company includes configurations and data that allow you to explore and validate the core functional domains of Business Central. These core functional domains include supply chain and financial management. You can immediately start and explore functions like sales quotes, orders, and invoices in Business Central. You can add data and implement the available functions, but you cannot delete and modify data.


    3. What is Dynamics 365 Home?

      Dynamics 365 Home is a cloud software solution for facility management and real estate.

      Dynamics 365 Home is a landing page where you’ll find all your Dynamics 365 apps, including Business Central, along with apps that work with them from Microsoft AppSource.

      Dynamics 365 Home is a subscription for home use of Dynamics 365 software. Students can use this subscription to learn and explore Dynamics 365 products and functionalities at home.

      Dynamics 365 Home is a landing page where you can find all Microsoft documentation for end users, developers, and IT professionals, including quickstarts, tutorials, API reference, and code examples.


    4. Can you extend your initial 30-day trial period for Business Central?

      Yes, you can extend the first 30-day trial period yourself with a second 30-day trial period. After that, a Microsoft partner can help you extend it for another 30 days.

      No, there is only one 30-day trial period.

      Yes, you can extend the first 30-day trial period yourself with (only) one more 30-day trial period.

      Yes, you can extend the first 30-day trial period yourself with two more additional 30-day trial periods.
